title: Calcium
desc:
Post 860
*This couldnt be anything else but a bone reference*
- If played as a <:bone:1118750770133737565>, a copy of this card appears in your personal discard pile.
- The owner of the pile that this resides in gains 1 muscle. The host owns the play pile and the public discard pile.
- If played as a <:white:1107514189574045726>, powder it up and eat it directly, giving you 3 shield.
